		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

							<dd class="left" style="clear:none;"><div class='avatarblock js-avatar divcenter' data-userid='78690' data-username='mhutton' data-urlusername='mhutton'> 
	<div>The all-seeing, all-knowing, all-trollin&#039; Mike Hutton</div>
	<div class='username'>(<a href="/user/mhutton">mhutton</a>)</div>
	
	<div class='location js-location'>United States<br>moline<br>illinois</div>
	
	<div>
		<table align='center'>
		<tr>
			<td>
						<a href="/users?country=United%20States" class='js-avatar-flag'><img class='icon vam i_flag_usa' title='' alt='flag' style=''  src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a>

</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									40<br /><br />2016 -<br />2015 -<br /><br />Really enjoy this city building game, and like how the mechanics of the numbered workers plays. As much as I liked suburbia, I enjoy this game a little better. This game may not be as deep as Suburbia, nut in this case less is more.
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"

						<dd class="doubleright">
									39<br /><br />2016 -<br />2015 -<br /><br />What a great time I have had with this game this year. Although it tries to disguise itself as a dungeon delver, it's really a racing game imo.  A great "push your luck" game, as you try to decide how long, and how deep to go in the depths of the dungeon searching for treasures while still having a chance to make it out with your treasures.

							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>

			</a>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									36<br /><br />2016 29<br />2015 30<br /><br />Sad to see this line come to a close with final release due out any day now. This game has provided me with many hours of superhero slugfests, which it does an excellent job of representing. The two biggest knocks has been addressed.<br />1) the lack of containing no-name heroes has subsided, as now I feel like this universe has its own identity when it initially felt like it did not.<br /><br />2) bookkeeping, no longer an issue when playing its iOS version.<br /><br />A must have for any super hero fan.
								<div class='clear'></div>

			</a>

			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}

				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>

		</div>

									<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" href="javascript://" data-objecttype="listitem" data-objectid="5685629">Comment</a>
								</li>
														
							
															
																					<li>
								<a class="comment_button" href="javascript://"
									onclick="ShowParentRolls( { parent_objecttype: 'listitem',
											  parent_objectid:   5685629 } );">Comment Die Rolls</a>

								<div class="threadrolllog dn" id="listitem_log_5685629"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class="clear"></div>
					</li>
									</ul>
				<div class="clear"></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<div class="clear"></div>
					<div class="rollsblock dn" id="rolls_wrapper_listitem_5685629">
	<ul class="horizontal_list title" onclick="cToggle('rollsblock_listitem_5685629');">
		<li class="title">[+] Dice rolls</li>
	</ul>
	<div id="rollsblock_listitem_5685629" class="dn">
		
	</div>
	<div class="clear"></div>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>

					</dd>
				</dl>

					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">

									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>

								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>

						</ul>

					</dd>
				</dl>

				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

	</div>

					<li><a href="/thread/browse/region/1?sort=active">Active</a></li>
					<li><a href="/forum/search/region/1">Search</a></li>
					<li><a href="/article/create/region/1">Post Thread</a></li>
					<li><a href="/wiki/page/Admins">Moderators</a></li>

					<li><a href="/thread/subscriptions">Subscriptions</a></li>						
					<li><a href="/community_rules">Rules</a></li>
				</ul>

		</div>					
	</li>

	</div>
	<div style='position:absolute;  z-index:2000;' id='recsure_geeklist230158'></div></div>
			Time to re-assess my Top 100 games, and I was surprised to see how this list has changed from most of my previous lists.<br /><br />The only rule I have when making my list is that it still must be in my collection.<br /><br />I was surprised to see how many games have fallen off my list from last year (a whopping 30). Some of that is due to me playing more new games this year than I have in years past.<br /><br />I do think this is the best list I have compiled since I have started doing this<br /><br />These are the games that fell off my list from last year:<br /><br />100. Tobago<br />99. Power Grid<br />98. Castaways<br />95. Kingdom Death Monster<br />93. Suburbia<br />92. The Undercity<br />90. Arena Rex<br />88. 5 Tribes<br />87. D&D adventure board game series<br />84. Last Friday<br />83. Runewars<br />82. Rivit Wars<br />81. Rune Age<br />80. Catacombs<br />79. Hero quest<br />78. Betrayal House on the Hill<br />76. Dungeon Twister<br />75. Dice City<br />73. Karuba<br />69. Star Realms<br />68. Xenoshyft<br />65. Middle Earth Quest<br />61. X-com<br />59. Carnival Zombie<br />57. Chaos in the Old World<br />55. Star Wars risk<br />54. Deadzone<br />51. Mansions of Madness<br />50. The Downfall of Pompeii<br />46. Gears of War<br />
							<div class='geeklist_tags'>				
			 		<div id='tagstatus_0' style='position:absolute; margin: 2px 0 0 2px;  background-color:red; color:white;'></div>
<table class='sf'>
	<tr>
	<td class='sf' align='right'>Your Tags:</td>
	<td class='sf'>
		<a href="javascript://" onclick="GT_AddTag( 0 )">Add tags</a>
				<span id='yourtags_0'>
			
		</span> 
		<div id='tagentry_0' style='display:none;'>
			<form style='margin:1em;'

	</td>
</tr>

	<tr>

			</a>

	  data-ng-init='init({"objecttype":"listitem","objectid":5688464,"disallowcomments":false,"showcount":50,"commentid":0,"showeditcontrols":0,"showadmincontrols":0,"showdeletecontrols":0,"viewdate":false,"events":[],"hidecomments":false,"numitems":"0","endpage":0,"direction":"previous","inclusive":true,"showmore":true}, {&quot;config&quot;:{&quot;locked&quot;:0,&quot;objectlink&quot;:&quot;&lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/9209\/ticket-ride\&quot;   &gt;Ticket to Ride&lt;\/a&gt; &amp;raquo; &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/geeklist\/230158\/item\/5688464#item5688464\&quot;   &gt;Item for Geeklist \&quot;Hell has frozen over.......a new #1 in my new Top 100 games of all-time (2017 edition)\&quot; &lt;\/a&gt;&quot;,&quot;current_userid&quot;:null,&quot;numitems&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;numprevitems&quot;:0},&quot;comments&quot;:[]})'>
	
		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>

								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>

		</div>

					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>

								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">

		</div>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">

					</dd>

						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>

						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">

								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]

							</li>
						</ul>

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>

		</div>

									19<br /><br />2016 12<br />2015 17<br /><br />Love the command and color system. It provides a lot more strategy that you made be led to believe due to the realities ease it is to learn to play.<br /><br />Hand management is critical, and can be somewhat mitigated by keeping units straddling 2 zones at once.  A true classic, and my favorite ww2 game.

					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

			</a>

	  data-ng-init='init({"objecttype":"listitem","objectid":5690379,"disallowcomments":false,"showcount":50,"commentid":0,"showeditcontrols":0,"showadmincontrols":0,"showdeletecontrols":0,"viewdate":false,"events":[],"hidecomments":false,"numitems":"0","endpage":0,"direction":"previous","inclusive":true,"showmore":true}, {&quot;config&quot;:{&quot;locked&quot;:0,&quot;objectlink&quot;:&quot;&lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/174430\/gloomhaven\&quot;   &gt;Gloomhaven&lt;\/a&gt; &amp;raquo; &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/geeklist\/230158\/item\/5690379#item5690379\&quot;   &gt;Item for Geeklist \&quot;Hell has frozen over.......a new #1 in my new Top 100 games of all-time (2017 edition)\&quot; &lt;\/a&gt;&quot;,&quot;current_userid&quot;:null,&quot;numitems&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;numprevitems&quot;:0},&quot;comments&quot;:[]})'>
	
		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

						</ul>

					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>

			</div>
		</div>

				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>

					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',

				alt="Avatar"></a>
		</div>
	
		
			
		
	<div ><a href="/microbadge/2974"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Chicago Cubs fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_2974_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/6997"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('San Diego Chargers fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_6997_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/34410"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Platinum Board Game Collector', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_34410_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/20308"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Level 05 BGG poster', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_20308_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/3409"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Parent of big sister and little brother', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_3409_0.gif"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									13<br /><br />2016 21<br />2015 20<br /><br />Don't get fooled....this i, hands down, the best Star Wars skirmish game there is game did a great job of representing all the characters, and the mechanics were straightforward and easy to understand. The game rewarded those who usually had the best tactics on the battlefield.<br /><br />Team customization, pre-painted........this one had it all.<br /><br /><br />If you missed out on this long oop Classic from wotc, I feel sorry for you. I feel no need to pick up the upcoming Legions because I can't picture it being better
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<dl>
							<dd class="doubleleft">
									<div id='recommendstatus_listitem5690409'>
	<dl class="recommend">
			<dt class='recs'><a href="/login">6</a>&nbsp;</dt>
	<dd class='thumbdd'><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class="icon " src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" alt="Thumb up" title="Thumb up"></a></dd>

	<dd><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class='icon i_coinsmall2' title='GeekGold Tip' alt='tip' style=''  src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a></dd>

	</dl>

				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"

							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									12<br /><br />2016 23<br />2015 26<br /><br />Not sure if it was the theme of selling drugs and guns, or the fact that the show was ending when this was released, but this is easily the most under appreciated game I have ran across in my 20 years in the hobby. Clean, tight mechanics mixed with great player interaction, and a strong theme that carries the TV show vibe over into board game form. <br /><br />Do yourself a favor......pick this up and give it a try.....you will not regret it.<br /><br />I am very hopeful Breaking Bad will be this good.
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>

			</span>

		</div>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">

									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>

						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>

									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]

						</ul>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									5<br /><br />2016 -<br />2015 -<br /><br />The best new game I pals in 2017, and that's saying a lot as this was indeed a great year for board gaming. It really does feel like you are playing a videotape at times. All that's missing is team v team play....and that is supposed to be in the next expansion, which could cause this game to go even higher on my list.

			</span>

			</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>

					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

	</div>
